title: Hololive - Underworld Academy Overload!!
alternative_title: Soreyuke!! Makai Gakkou ; それゆけ!! 魔界学校 ; Sukaria Sekolah Alam Bawah
status: Soreyuke!! Makai Gakkou ; それゆけ!! 魔界学校 ; Sukaria Sekolah Alam Bawah
description:
Description :
        **School life chaos with hololive!**Come enter the world of hololive Alternative, an alternate universe fantasy project starring your favorite hololive VTubers!This story has been lovingly brought to life with the dynamic artwork of manga artist Moroyan!Deep below the frozen tundra like the Underworld Geo.There, all sorts of underworlders spend their eternities.Some even go to school, where the antics never end.
